page.shortlink: dt cp Automatically Positioning the Cursor
page.description: You can specify where the cursor appears during edits.

step.description: In the Control Panel select the table and click Table > Edit Field Rules.
In the Position cursor at drop-down list box, choose one of the following options:

case.description: "End of selected text" - Use this option if the value in the field is generally replaced during edits. Highlighted entries are automatically deleted as soon as you start typing a new word.
"Start of unselected text" - Use this option for fields in which you generally edit existing values.
"End of unselected text" - This is the preferred option for fields in which you enter notes. You can easily add text to the end without deleting text already in a field.
